title: Question about pre-game lobby
body:
Hi, I was just wondering where exactly I submit a ticket to report a toxic player in pre-game lobbies.

I couldn't find anything about it in any support category, and I'd prefer not to post the screenshots on boards.

replies.body:
[Support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) > I have a question about league of legends/ riot games.

Be sure that your ticket header is clear, your statements are clear and that you remember to attatch the evidence.

Due to privacy reasons Riot can't respond to your ticket with details about if a punishment was handed out or not.
